summary: The Federal Protective Service (FPS) protects about 9,000 federal facilities and their occupants. For the third time in almost 20 years, FPS has moved into a new agency within the Department of Homeland Security. This agency, the Management Directorate, is responsible for providing human capital and other services. FPS has experienced several benefits from the move, including more support from leadership. But FPS continues to...
title: Federal Protective Service: More Collaboration on Hiring and Additional Performance Information Needed
